views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 to 12

Power off / Reboot / ldrestart / safe mode / Respring / uicache / Lock are carried out in ControlCenter, Power off menu and Apps.

Wi-Fi IP, Global IP, RAM information can be displayed in the ControlCenter's information section.

Configure options from Settings app.

1.2.1 Add: sbreload option Add: option to show uptime on CC (Off by default) Support for landscape screen on iPhone in Applications. 1.2.0

Support for landscape screen and Upside Down screen on iPad in Applications.

Add: dark mode in application
(It does not work unless tweak is enabled)

Add: share menu



1.1-8
Support for A12(X) arm64e devices
1.1-4
Delete: The dependency of Opener
Note: In jailbreak with Electra, if "opener" is installed, it will freeze with "ldrestart".

1.1-5
Support for unc0ver
In jailbreak with unc0ver, "ldrestart" can be used even if "Opener" is installed.
Known issue: "unc0ver" will restart with shutdown.
1.1-3
Add: PowerSelector's application
Add: Power Slider sections
- Tap the knob on the power off menu to switch

Add: New setting menu

Delete: The dependency of CCSupport
- Please install CCSupport or Silo.
1.1-1

Delete: The dependency of RocketBootStrap


1.0-9

Add: LDRestart
Add: Show Global IP
Add: Copy Global IP
Add: Show / Hide information section
RocketBootStrap depends to run ldrestart.

Special thanks @angelXwind
1.0-8
Fixed a problem not working on the application.


1.0-7
Added: Settings
Please turn on the item you want to use.
